root.name: Top Gun: Firestorm
root.description: OverviewTop Gun: Firestorm is a shooter developed by Fluid Studios and published by Titus Interactive for the Game Boy Color and Game Boy Advance platforms.GameplayTop Gun: Firestorm is a mission based isometric perspective flight action game. Both the Game Boy Advance and Game Boy Color version of Top Gun: Firestorm feature the same missions and play styles. In Top Gun: Firestorm the player plays as the character of Maverick, the same Maverick from the movie titled Top Gun. In each mission there are multiple objectives that must be completed one at a time.
